CaseTeamTemplateRecord.name: CaseTeamTemplateRecord
CaseTeamTemplateRecord.description: The CaseTeamTemplateRecord object is a linking object between the Case and CaseTeamTemplate objects. To assign a predefined case team to a case (customer inquiry), create a CaseTeamTemplateRecord record and point the ParentId to the case and the TeamTemplateId to the predefined case team.

ParentId.description: The ID of the case with which the case team template record is associated.

TeamTemplateId.description: The ID of the predefined case team with which the case team template record is associated.
